linkGuidePageVerificationService: Companies House identity verification standard welsh
keepRecordsOfTheIdentityChecks: You'll need to keep records of the identity checks for 7 years from the date you completed them. We may ask to see these records to check you’ve met our standard. welsh
suspendOrStopBusinessWarningText: We could suspend or stop your business from acting as an authorised agent if you have not met our identity verification standard. welsh

thereAre2OptionsForChecking: There are 2 options for checking identity documents in our identity verification standard. You’ll need to tell us: welsh
option1or2: whether you used option 1 or 2 welsh
